title: Leona & the Crown of Llangollen
description: Can be read as a standalone or part of the series.With no desire for fame or glory, only one thing can bring Leona to her destiny—the Crown of Llangollen!Leona was born out of the earth. A stranger. A loner. An elven princess from a bygone age. She wants nothing more than to return to the harmony of sleep in the earth’s womb. She doesn’t want to fight or make friends. She longs to be left alone with her wolves.The Elements have made a pact, something must change or they will abandon the Seven Worlds of Feww. Destruction bides its time, while Fire sets into motion events to turn the tide.The newly formed band of elves needs to get along and work as one before they can take on the enemies of peace. Racing against them are the instruments of the three sister men, beasts, and demons, all with one mission—find the crown first!Can Leona overcome her longing for solitude and lead the elves that follow her to victory? Or will the half-dragon beast in the snow lure her to her destruction?Leona & the Crown of Llangollen is a young adult, epic fantasy. Exciting, fast-paced, and drenched in mythical magic.For fans of Ursula K. Le Guin, J. R. R. Tolkien, and Patrick Rothfuss.
author: T.N. Traynor
